why-us.title: Comfort and safety for your pet
why-us.description: We have a fully equipped van designed for the safety and comfort of your pet.

services.title: Services
services.description1: Are you looking to transport your pet to Spain, the United Kingdom, or Ireland? We offer two different types of services for your dog or cat's journey.
services.services-spain: Spanish cities - Select a city and service.
services.services-uk: Brithish cities - Select a city and service.
services.services-ireland: Irish cities - Select a city and service.

intro.description1: Welcome to Ohmydog Pet Travel, your trusted company for pet transportation between Spain, the United Kingdom, and Ireland! With 8 years of specialized experience, we are leaders in providing short and safe journeys for your adorable four-legged companions.
intro.description2: Our vehicle, equipped with the most advanced adaptations in the industry, ensures the well-being of your pets throughout every kilometer of the journey. From web cameras that allow you to follow their trip in real time to relaxing music to keep them calm, every detail is designed to make transportation a comfortable and enjoyable experience.
intro.description3: The controlled temperature ensures an optimal environment, while the natural light cycle provides a home-like setting. Our padded floors offer additional comfort, and the GPS link keeps you informed of the exact location of your beloved furry companions at all times.
intro.description4: Trust Ohmydog Pet Travel to safely and comfortably transport your dogs and cats between Spain, the United Kingdom, and Ireland. Make every journey a happy experience for your pets with us!

why-us.meta-description: Somos especialistas en transporte de mascotas. Responsabilidad, seguridad, empat√≠a y transparencia total en su viaje.

Nuestro compromiso es brindar un viaje seguro y confortable para tu mascota en cada trayecto realizado en Espa√±a.

our-commitment.meta-title: Our commitment with the clients and their pets
our-commitment.meta-description: We are dedicated to ensuring safe and comfortable transportation for your pet, utilizing the latest technology available for animal transport.

hero.title: OMD Pet Travel
hero.subtitle: Your pet‚Äôs trip between Spain, the UK and Ireland
hero.description: We are a pet transport company with some of the best feedback in the industry, specializing in the transport of dogs and cats between Spain, the United Kingdom, and Ireland. Our goal is to ensure the comfort and safety of your pet during the trip.

services-block.title: Services
services-block.description: Trust us to transport your pet safely and comfortably with the latest in pet transportation technology.

block-1.title: Requirements
block-1.text: We follow all the requirements to transport your pets legally and ensure their safety and comfort.
block-1.advantage1: Highly trained team with animal welfare certificates.
block-1.advantage2: Vehicles possessing both DEFRA (UK) and ATES (EU) licenses.
block-1.advantage3: Contingency plan in place for cases of emergency.

block-2.title: Vehicles
block-2.text: Our vehicles are equipped with top-of-the-line van conversions featuring state-of-the-art technology, including:
block-2.advantage1: GPS tracker that shows temperatures and locations.

block-3.title: Anti-stress tech
block-3.text: Our vans are designed with your pet's comfort and well-being in mind. The interior features:
block-3.advantage1: Antistress decor and relaxing music: keeps your pet calm and relaxed during the journey.
block-3.advantage2: Natural light cycle: helps to regulate your pet's body clock, making the trip more comfortable for them.

block-4.title: Stops
block-4.text: We understand that pets need regular breaks and attention during long journeys. That‚Äôs why we make regular stops to:
block-4.advantage2: Ensure dogs, cats and other animals are hydrated, fed and their crates are cleaned.
block-4.advantage3: Send many updates to their families with photos and videos.

blog.meta-description: Discover valuable information and tips on transporting pets to Spain, the United Kingdom, or Ireland, and get to know our team better.
blog.title: Pet Travel Vlog with Ohmydog!
blog.description: Here, you can discover valuable information and tips on transporting pets to Spain, the United Kingdom, or Ireland, and get to know our team better. We'll regularly share videos and updates to keep you informed and connected with us. Follow our vlog to stay updated on everything related to pet transportation and learn more about how we can assist you and your furry friend.

about-us.meta-title: Experienced and qualified on animals care and transport
about-us.meta-description: Trust Ohmydog to provide you with the best care and service for dogs and cats. We guarantee safety, sympathy and transparency during your pets travel.
about-us.title: About us
about-us.description1: Welcome to Ohmydog, a trusted pet transport company. Our priority is the safety and comfort of your furry friend. We understand that leaving your pet behind can be stressful and emotional, so we strive to make the transportation process as comfortable and stress-free as possible.
about-us.description2: Our team of experienced and dedicated professionals will handle all aspects of your pet's transportation, from pickup to delivery.
about-us.description3: Our state-of-the-art vehicles are equipped with the latest technology and features, including climate control, padded floors, relaxing music, and anti-stress d√©cor to ensure a stress-free and peaceful journey for your pet.
about-us.description4: Therefore, if you need to transport your pet, whether for a move or for a vacation, trust Ohmydog to provide you with the best care and service. Contact us today for more information and to start planning your pet's travel.

trips.meta-description: Check our calendar of trips and book your pet's transport.
trips.title: Our next Trips
trips.description1: Check our upcoming pet trips to Spain, the United Kingdom, and Ireland in the PDF.
trips.description3: If you can find your desired dates in the pdf, just contact us!

cookies.title: Cookies at OMD Pet Travel.
cookies.paragraph1: Due to the entry into force of the referent modification of the 'law of services of the information society' (lssice) established by royal decree 13/2012, it is mandatory to obtain the express consent of the user of all the web pages that they use expendable cookies, before you navigate through them.
cookies.paragraph2-1: Cookies and other similar technologies such as local shared objects, flash cookies or pixels, are tools used by web servers to store and retrieve information about their visitors, as well as to offer a correct functioning of the site.
cookies.paragraph2-2: Through the use of these devices, the web server is allowed to remember some data concerning the user, such as their preferences for viewing the pages of that server, name and password, products that interest them the most, etc.
cookies.title3: Cookies affected by the regulation and excepted cookies
cookies.paragraph3: According to the eu directive, the cookies that require the informed consent of the user are analytical cookies and advertising and affiliation cookies, except for those of a technical nature and those necessary for the operation of the website or the provision of services. Expressly requested by the user.
cookies.title4: What types of cookies are there?
cookies.paragraph4: Regarding the types of cookies, there are five large groups:
cookies.li4-1: Analytical cookies: they collect information on the use made of the website.
cookies.li4-2: Social cookies: are those necessary for external social networks.
cookies.li4-3: Affiliate cookies: they allow the tracking of visits from other websites, with which the website establishes an affiliation contract (affiliation companies).
cookies.li4-4: Advertising and behavioral cookies: they collect information about the user's preferences and personal choices (retargeting).
cookies.li4-5: Technical and functional cookies: these are strictly necessary for the use of the website and for the provision of the contracted service.
cookies.title5: Revocation of consent to install cookies how to delete cookies from the browser
cookies.paragraph5: If you delete cookies, you will be signed out of the websites and your saved preferences may be deleted.
cookies.li5-1-2: At the top right, click More Settings.
cookies.li5-1-3: Under 'Privacy and security,' click Cookies and other site data.
cookies.li5-1-4: Click See all cookies and website data Delete all.
cookies.li5-1-5: To confirm the action, click Delete all.
cookies.paragraph5-1: For more information about Chrome click
cookies.li5-2-3: In the Advanced Settings section select Block or ask.
cookies.paragraph5-2: For more information on Internet Explorer click
cookies.li5-3-1: Select Firefox | History | Clear recent history
cookies.li5-3-2: Next to 'Details', click the down arrow.
cookies.li5-3-3: Select the following check boxes: Cookies, Cache, Active Logins.
cookies.li5-3-4: Using the ‚ÄúTime range to clear‚Äù dropdown menu, select All.
cookies.paragraph5-3-1: You can accept or reject cookies individually in Firefox Preferences, in the History section available in Tools > Options > Privacy.
cookies.paragraph5-3-2: For more information on Firefox click
cookies.paragraph5-4-1: In the Safari app on your Mac, choose Safari > Preferences, click Privacy, then do any of the following:
cookies.li5-4-1: Stop trackers from using website and cookie data to track you: Select ‚ÄúPrevent cross-site tracking.‚Äù
cookies.li5-4-2: Always block cookies: Select ‚ÄúBlock all cookies‚Äù.
cookies.li5-4-3: Always allow cookies: Uncheck ‚ÄúBlock all cookies‚Äù.
cookies.li5-4-4: Delete cookies and stored data: Click ‚ÄúManage website data‚Äù, select one or more websites, then click Delete or ‚ÄúDelete all‚Äù.
cookies.paragraph5-4-2: For more information on Safari click
cookies.paragraph5-5-2: The cookie options control the way in which Opera handles them and therefore their acceptance or rejection. For more information about Opera click
cookies.paragraph5-6: Consult the documentation of the browser you have installed.
cookies.title6: Legal warning Information society services law (LSSI)
cookies.paragraph6-1: OHMYDOG PET TRAVEL O.E. responsible for the website, hereinafter RESPONSIBLE, makes this document available to users, with which it intends to comply with the obligations set forth in Law 34/2002, of July 11, on Services of the Information Society and of Electronic Commerce (LSSICE), BOE No. 166, as well as informing all users of the website regarding the conditions of use.
cookies.paragraph6-2: Any person who accesses this website assumes the role of user, committing to the observance and strict compliance with the provisions set forth herein, as well as any other legal provision that may be applicable. OHMYDOG PET TRAVEL O.E. reserves the right to modify any type of information that may appear on the website, without there being any obligation to give advance notice or inform users of said obligations, with publication on the OHMYDOG PET TRAVEL O.E. website being understood as sufficient.
cookies.paragraph6-1-1: OHMYDOG PET TRAVEL O.E. with CIF E16933608 and registered office at AVENIDA DE LAS JACARANDAS 2, 802, BURJASSOT, VALENCIA, 46100 Telephone: +34 656 830 322 Email: info@omdtravel.com
cookies.paragraph6-2-1: The website, including but not limited to its programming, editing, compilation and other elements necessary for its operation, the designs, logos, text and/or graphics, are the property of the RESPONSIBLE or, if applicable, have a license or express authorization by the authors. All the contents of the website are duly protected by the regulations of intellectual and industrial property, as well as registered in the corresponding public registries. Regardless of the purpose for which they were intended, the total or partial reproduction, use, exploitation, distribution and marketing, in any case requires the prior written authorization of the RESPONSIBLE. Any use not previously authorized is considered a serious breach of the intellectual or industrial property rights of the author.
cookies.paragraph6-2-2: The designs, logos, text and/or graphics not belonging to the RESPONSIBLE and that may appear on the website, belong to their respective owners, who are themselves responsible for any possible controversy that may arise with respect to them. The RESPONSIBLE expressly authorizes third parties to redirect directly to the specific contents of the website, and in any case redirect to the main website of https://www.omdtravel.com. The RESPONSIBLE acknowledges in favour of their owners the corresponding intellectual and industrial property rights, and their mere mention or appearance on the website does not imply the existence of any rights or responsibility over them, nor does it imply endorsement, sponsorship or recommendation by the same.
cookies.paragraph6-2-3: To make any type of observation regarding possible breaches of intellectual or industrial property rights, as well as any of the contents of the website, you can do so via email info@omdtravel.com
cookies.paragraph6-3-1: The RESPONSIBLE is exempt from any type of responsibility derived from the information published on its website provided that this information has been manipulated or entered by a third party unrelated to it.
cookies.paragraph6-3-1-1: This website may use technical cookies (small information files that the server sends to the computer of the person accessing the page) to carry out certain functions that are considered essential for the proper functioning and display of the site. The cookies used are, in any case, temporary, with the sole purpose of making browsing more efficient, and disappear when the user's session ends. In no case, these cookies provide personal data by themselves and will not be used to collect them. Through the use of cookies it is also possible that the server where the website is located recognizes the browser used by the user in order to make navigation easier, allowing, for example, access by users who have previously registered to the areas, services, promotions or contests reserved exclusively for them without having to register for each visit. They can also be used to measure the audience, traffic parameters, control the progress and number of entries, etc. In these cases, these cookies are technically dispensable but beneficial for the user. This website will not install dispensable cookies without the prior consent of the user. The user has the possibility of configuring his browser to be alerted of the reception of cookies and to prevent their installation on his computer. Please consult your browser's instructions for further information.
cookies.paragraph6-3-2: Is not responsible for the information and content stored, by way of example but not limitation, in forums, chats, blog generators, comments, social networks or any other means that allows third parties to publish content independently on the website. of the RESPONSIBLE. However, and in compliance with the provisions of articles 11 and 16 of the LSSICE, it is made available to all users, authorities and security forces, actively collaborating in the withdrawal or, where appropriate, blocking of all those contents that may affect or contravene national or international legislation, the rights of third parties or morality and public order. In the event that the user considers that there is any content on the website that could be susceptible to this classification, please notify the website administrator immediately. This website has been reviewed and tested to work properly. In principle, correct operation can be guaranteed 365 days a year, 24 hours a day. However, the RESPONSIBLE does not rule out the possibility that there are certain programming errors, or that force majeure, natural disasters, strikes or similar circumstances occur that make access to the website impossible.
cookies.paragraph6-3-3: The website's servers will be able to automatically detect the IP address and domain name used by the user. An IP address is a number automatically assigned to a computer when it connects to the Internet. All this information is recorded in a duly registered server activity file that allows the subsequent processing of the data in order to obtain only statistical measurements that allow knowing the number of page impressions, the number of visits made to the web servers, the order of visits, the access point, etc.
cookies.paragraph6-4-1: For the resolution of all disputes or issues related to this website or the activities developed therein, Spanish legislation will apply, to which the parties expressly submit, being competent to resolve all disputes arising or related to its use the nearest Courts and Tribunals.
cookies.paragraph7-1: OHMYDOG PET TRAVEL O.E. hereinafter RESPONSIBLE, is Responsible for the processing of the User's personal data and informs you that these data will be processed in accordance with the provisions of Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of April 27, 2016 (GDPR) regarding the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and the free circulation of these data, for which the following information on the processing is provided:
cookies.paragraph7-2: End of treatment: maintain a commercial relationship with the User. The operations planned to carry out the treatment are:
cookies.paragraph7-3: Remission of commercial advertising communications by email, fax, SMS, MMS, social communities or any other electronic or physical means, present or future, that makes it possible to carry out commercial communications. These communications will be made by the RESPONSIBLE and related to their products and services, or their collaborators or suppliers with whom they have reached a promotion agreement. In this case, third parties will never have access to personal data.
cookies.li7-3-2: Process orders, requests or any type of request that is made by the user through any of the contact forms that are made available to them.
cookies.li7-3-3: Forward the newsletter on the website.
cookies.paragraph7-4: Data conservation criteria: they will be kept as long as there is a mutual interest to maintain the end of the treatment and when it is no longer necessary for that purpose, they will be deleted with adequate security measures to guarantee the pseudonymization of the data or the total destruction of the data. themselves.
cookies.paragraph7-5: Communication of the data: The data will not be communicated to third parties, except legal obligation.
cookies.li7-6-1: Right to withdraw consent at any time.
cookies.li7-6-2: Right of access, rectification, portability and deletion of your data and the limitation or opposition to its treatment.
cookies.li7-6-3: Right to file a claim with the control authority (agpd.es) if you consider that the treatment does not comply with current regulations.
cookies.paragraph7-7: Contact information to exercise your rights:
cookies.paragraph7-8: OHMYDOG PET TRAVEL O.E. with CIF E16933608 and registered office at AVENIDA DE LAS JACARANDAS 2, 802, BURJASSOT, VALENCIA, 46100 Telephone: +34 656 830 322 Email: info@omdtravel.com
cookies.title8: Mandatory or optional character of the information provided by the user
cookies.paragraph8-1: The Users, by marking the corresponding boxes and entering data in the fields, marked with an asterisk (*) in the contact form or presented in download forms, expressly and freely and unequivocally accept that their data is necessary to meet your request, by the provider, the inclusion of data in the remaining fields being voluntary. The User guarantees that the personal data provided to the RESPONSIBLE is true and is responsible for communicating any changes to them.
cookies.paragraph8-2: The RESPONSIBLE informs and expressly guarantees users that their personal data will not be transferred in any case to third parties, and that whenever any type of transfer of personal data is made, the express, informed and unequivocal consent of the Users will be requested in advance. All the data requested through the website are mandatory, since they are necessary for the provision of an optimal service to the User. In the event that all the data is not provided, it is not guaranteed that the information and services provided will be completely adjusted to your needs.
cookies.paragraph9-1: That in accordance with the provisions of current regulations on the protection of personal data, the RESPONSIBLE is complying with all the provisions of the GDPR regulations for the processing of personal data for which it is responsible, and manifestly with the principles described in article 5 of the GDPR, for which they are treated in a lawful, loyal and transparent manner in relation to the interested party and adequate, pertinent and limited to what is necessary in relation to the purposes for which they are treated.
cookies.paragraph9-2: The CONTROLLER guarantees that it has implemented appropriate technical and organizational policies to apply the security measures established by the GDPR in order to protect the rights and freedoms of Users and has communicated the appropriate information so that they can exercise them.
